long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This innovative new extension provides a 500px by 500px window when clicked on, that replaces your cursor with an image of a face. Not only, does this cursor replacer move with your mouse, but when you click, a fart noise plays. The cursor replacement does not work outside the window and the face or fart noise does not vary.
